#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long
using namespace std;

ll gcd(ll a,ll b){
	if(b==0)
	return a;
	else
	return gcd(b,a%b);
}

int main(){
	ll x1,y1,x2,y2,n,x,y,p,q;
	cin>>n;
	while(n--){
		cin>>x1>>y1>>x2>>y2;
		x=abs(x2-x1);
		y=abs(y2-y1);
		if(x==0 || y==0)
		cout<<0<<endl;
		else if(x==y)
		cout<<y<<endl;
		else{
			ll temp =gcd(x,y);
			p = x/temp;
			q = y/temp;
			cout<<(p+q-1)*temp<<endl;
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
